word_mean: 有毒力的，毒性的：高度致病的、有毒的、有害的

sentence.Network_en: A very virulent form of the disease appeared in Belgium.
sentence.Network_cn: 比利时出现了这种疾病的一种极其危险的变体。

sentence.Network_en: Friends spoke of "a virulent personal campaign" being waged against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 朋友们说针对他正在发起“一场恶毒的个人攻击”。

sentence.Network_en: The media has waged a virulent hate campaign against her.
sentence.Network_cn: 新闻界向她发起了恶毒攻击。

... . . .制与生物合成）、成熟（装配）和裂解（释放）。凡在短时间内能连续完成以上5个阶段而实现其增殖的噬菌体，称为烈性噬菌体（virulent phage） ，反之则称为温和噬菌体（temperate phage）。溶源性温和噬菌体侵入相应宿主细胞后，由于前.
...毒性噬菌体编辑毒性噬菌体(virulent phage)在宿主菌体内复制增殖，产生许多子代噬菌体，并最终裂解细菌。因此，毒性噬菌体的增殖方式是复制，其增殖过程经历吸附、穿入、脱壳、生物合成和成熟释放五个阶段，构成噬菌体一个复制周期或溶菌周期.
virulence 毒力virulence test 毒力试验viruria 病毒尿

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally describing a poisoned wound): from Latin virulentus, from virus 'poison' (see virus)

entry.tran: 恶毒的;狠毒的;充满敌意的
entry.def: Virulent feelings or actions are extremely bitter and hostile.

example.ex: Now he faces virulent attacks from the Italian media...
example.tran: 现在他面临着意大利媒体的恶毒攻击。

example.ex: Friends spoke of 'a virulent personal campaign' being waged against him.
example.tran: 朋友们说针对他正在发起“一场恶毒的个人攻击”。

entry.def: A virulent disease or poison is extremely powerful and dangerous.

example.ex: A very virulent form of the disease appeared in Belgium.
example.tran: 比利时出现了这种疾病的一种极其危险的变体。

example.ex: ...a particularly virulent strain of the virus.
example.tran: 这种病毒中毒性尤为强烈的一种

means.word_mean: 1. extremely poisonous or injurious; producing venom;
2. infectious; having the ability to cause disease

sentences.sentence: "an acerbic tone piercing otherwise flowery prose"
"her acrid remarks make her many enemies"
"caustic jokes about political assassination, talk-show hosts and medical ethics"

means.word_mean: 刻毒的,恶毒的,充满仇恨的

sentences.en: She is very virulent about her former employer.
sentences.cn: 她对她过去的老板恨之入骨。
